ID.Name: ID
ID.Description: FHIR identifier for the target Condition resource.

Condition.Name: Condition
Condition.Description: An instance of the R4 Condition resource.

abatementDateTime.Name: abatementDateTime
abatementDateTime.Description: The date and time the infection was resolved.

code.Name: code
code.Description: The display name for the infection and the SNOMED code if one exists.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: The encounter associated with the infection. Only applies to encounter-level infections.

onsetDateTime.Name: onsetDateTime
onsetDateTime.Description: The date the patient acquired the infection.

recordedDate.Name: recordedDate
recordedDate.Description: The date and time the infection was added to the patient’s chart.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient associated with the infection.
